meanings.definition: Coming after the forty-ninth in a series.
meanings.sent1: The fiftieth day of school was a big celebration.
meanings.sent2: She received a special award for her fiftieth birthday.
meanings.sent3: The fiftieth cookie in the jar magically disappeared.
meanings.sent5: The fiftieth star in the sky shone the brightest.

meanings.sent1: He ate the fiftieth cookie from the batch.
meanings.sent2: The fiftieth of the chocolates was missing.
meanings.sent3: The fiftieth piece of the puzzle completed the picture.
meanings.sent4: She won the fiftieth prize in the raffle.
meanings.sent5: The fiftieth slice of cake was saved for last.

meanings.sent1: Her birthday fell on the fiftieth of the month.
meanings.sent2: The fiftieth in line got the last ticket.
meanings.sent3: The fiftieth student to arrive won a prize.
meanings.sent4: He was the fiftieth person to cross the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The fiftieth page of the book held the surprise ending.
